pullRequest.title: Issue #1404: Implemented tests for Dts package acl layer

nodes.bodyText: The role ilself is valid but it just doens't meet the acl rules. Therefore I suppose we can rename the method to shouldDenyListDtsDataStorageWithoutUserRole

It is not directly connected with the pull request but it would be nice to refactor a bit. Could you please also replace hasRole('ADMIN') OR hasRole('ROLE_USER') with AclExpressions.ADMIN_OR_GENERAL_USER in DtsOperationsApiService similarly to DtsRegistryApiService.
Let's put all test beans to a single place which is better to be AclTestBeans.
